Package pl.rasztabiga.haldeserializer.deserializer

Main logic classes responsible for making http calls, deserialization, hal+json parsing etc.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Authentication
    Authentication class to support Authentication headers sent to REST API
    Authentication.Header
    Header class representing authorization header
    HalDeserializer
    Main library class used to proxy between user and HAL parser
    HalDeserializer.Builder
    Builder class for HalDeserializer
    HalLink
    HalLink class representing HAL hyperlinks included in JSON output
    HalParser
    HalParser class representing HAL+JSON parser
    HttpClient
    HttpClient class representing OkHttpClient wrapper used to make http calls to REST API
    Resource  
    ResourceBundle<T>
